doc:
Albert Popwell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Popwell 0 Albert Popwell (July 15, 1926 – April 9, 1999) was an African American stage, television and film actor with a career spanning six decades.Born in New York City, Popwell started as a professional dancer before taking up a career in acting. Popwell made his professional debut on Broadway at age 16 in The Pirate. Albert_Popwell ( July_15_,_1926 – April_9_,_1999 ) was an_African_American_stage_,_television_and_film_actor with a_career spanning six_decades.Born in New_York_City , Popwell started as a_professional_dancer before taking up a_career in acting . Popwell made his_professional_debut on Broadway at age_16 in The_Pirate .
